draft.title: SMARTYPANTS Funny Giraffe Greeting Card - Here's Looking At You Kid Movie Quote Pun For Birthday Anniversary Valentine's - Humorous Animal Card For Him Her Men Women Kids Wife Friend
draft.description:
Surprise someone special with a card that's as unique and charming as they are. This delightful giraffe greeting card from SMARTYPANTS puts a fun, modern twist on a classic movie line. The vibrant, quirky illustration is guaranteed to bring a smile to their face, making it the perfect choice for birthdays, anniversaries, Valentine's Day, or simply to say you're thinking of them.

Printed in the UK on premium, heavyweight cardstock, this card not only looks fantastic but feels high-quality too. The inside is left blank for your own personal touch, allowing you to craft the perfect message. Each card comes complete with a rustic kraft envelope, ready for you to send and make someone's day a little brighter.
draft.keywords: greetings cards notelet message note paper goods stationery blank inside with envelope eco friendly made in uk british design square 150mm boyfriend girlfriend partner mum dad son daughter sister brother colleague boss workmate bestie pal mate teen teenager adult presents gifts thinking of get well soon congratulations leaving new job just because love romance special occasion celebration party supplies witty clever joke safari jungle wildlife zoo long neck headphones music lover film
bullets: Charming Movie Pun – A delightful card for film lovers featuring a witty 'Here's Looking At You Kid' pun with two quirky giraffes, perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or Valentine's Day.
Premium Quality Cardstock – Expertly printed on thick, sustainably sourced 350gsm cardstock for a superior feel, complete with a high-quality, eco-friendly brown kraft envelope.
Blank For Your Message – The inside is left completely blank, providing ample space for you to write your own heartfelt, personal, or hilarious message for any recipient or occasion.
Vibrant Lasting Colours – Our professional printing process uses fade-resistant inks to ensure the bright, cheerful colours of the giraffe illustration remain vivid and impressive over time.
Ready To Gift – This unique 148x148mm square card arrives with its matching envelope in a protective sleeve, making it a wonderful standalone gift or a lovely addition to a present.
